attributes.action: Give all nhs staff a covid 19 bonus and a thank you after the pandemic .
attributes.additional_details: Because they deserve a payment to be able time go away.  Relax or treat themselves in the downturn after the pandemic .They always are reliable , never fail to do what’s right for the Patient even though they too are scared / anxious
attributes.background: The country needs to show their gratitude by allowing a one off bonus

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
